title: Strengthening CS Practical Skills: Designing Content Utilization Strategies in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital tool proficiency and understanding of elementary education curriculum
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the priority of core content and supplementary materials in blended learning environments with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can design three or more content arrangement strategies to enhance learner engagement when integrating online/in-person instruction.
Learners can directly select appropriate materials for project-based assessment tasks and explain the educational validity of selected materials using a three-tier evaluation rubric.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
